name: Blue: Ludum Dare 46
description:
You are a fox, lost in an arctic forest. Start a fire and keep it alive to stay warm.

WASD or Arrow keys to move
[E] to chop down trees and add logs to fire
[F] to light fire

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46 Jam by Pablo Teres, Brett Terpstra, and Blake Freer.

This was our first game jam. Our ambitions at the start were very high, and we did not implement all that we had originally, but we made a functional game and submitted it in time!

Software used:
Game Engine: Unity
Graphics: Aseprite, GIMP
Audio: Ableton Live, Freesound

Notes: Highscores are only available with the downloaded version.
